title: Clean and friendly service :)
review: We went on the train  Can we cant read thai  But the staff at the stations does help and every helpfully  The ticket price was cheep too  if you travel by city train from Airport you can reach the Bangkok City faster than Taxi

result.opinion: The staff at the stations were helpful.

title: Conveniently
review: Please avoid rush hour between 730900 am and 16001730 pm  Convenient for travel or business Easy for traveler

result.opinion: Convenient for travel or business

title: Visit to Central Embassy on Sujumvit Road
review: Great experience  Very practical and on time Well connected to the metro  I recommend it but a taxi is about the same price if 4 people

result.opinion: The review doesn't mention anything about staff quality.
Well connected to the metro
On time

title: Avoid the insane traffic!
review: Bangkok is a great place to visit but traffic can be absolutely insane BTS Skytrain is a clean efficient safe way to get around  recommend using it whenever possible

result.opinion: BTS Skytrain is a clean efficient safe way to get around
BTS Skytrain is a clean efficient safe way to get around

title: Amazing
review: Easy to travel on this train Staff at train stations are very helpful Travelers on the train very friendly and passengers waiting on the station are very good and will wait in lines until all passengers have alighted Cheap also

result.opinion: Staff at train stations are very helpful
Easy to travel on this train Cheap also

title: very comfortable to use
review: very easy i recommend you to buy a one day pass very cheap for use the Bts you can go almost every where

result.opinion: Very easy to use and cheap

title: Great way to airport
review: The BTS Skytrain is such a simple way to get to and from the big international airport Suvarnabhumi It is a cheaper (45 Bhat) trip than a taxi Catch a metered taxi or Tuk Tuk from the Phaya Thai station to where ever you want

result.opinion: The BTS Skytrain is a simple way to get to and from the airport.
The BTS Skytrain is a simple way to get to and from the airport.

title: Best Way to Get Around
review: It's so easy We bought rabbit cards so we could swipe on and swipe off As the traffic inevitably snarls below you zip along above If you are going to Bangkok it's a very easy and useful mode of transport

result.opinion: It's so easy

title: Fast connection in a good share of the inner city
review: If your destination is along the BTS skytrain net there is hardly any better way to get to it than with this skytrain If you stay for more than 2 or 3 days buy a Rabbit Card which you can upload and which saves you looking for coins and standing in line in front of the ticket machines every time you take the BTS

result.opinion: Highly convenient for reaching destinations along the BTS skytrain network.

title: Easy access
review: Caught the 1A bus from the airport to Mon Chit station and the Sky train from there Easy access to the city and not only do you miss the traffic so it is quicker but it is also about a tenth the price Staff at the bus station and the train stations were very helpful and always pleasant

result.opinion: Staff at the bus station and the train stations were very helpful and always pleasant

title: Brilliant
review: Easiest train system to work out Skip the taxis & Tuk Tuks Ride the train cheaper & so much quicker Very safe as we rode it day & night

result.opinion: Very safe as we rode it day & night
Easiest train system to work out Cheaper & so much quicker Very safe

title: Quick easy and cheap
review: Faster and cheaper than a tuktuk or taxi Set price so no messing around with haggling over price Nice and clean and easy to use

result.opinion: Faster and cheaper than a tuktuk or taxi, set price so no messing around with haggling over price
Nice and clean

title: Convenient and well organized
review: More cities should use this as their model for public transport  convenient well signposted and organized

result.opinion: Convenient

title: Fast. And quick access to places you wish to visit .
review: We were in the peak period of the day though very crowded   the taxi were taking  30 minutes for 1 kilometres A friend  help us to get this train

title: Low-cost, traffic-free way across the city
review: If you do shopping a lot the BTS route got stops on malls (i did travel quickly from MBK to Ekamai) And it's trafficfree But at rush hour you have to do a bit pushing around because most people still cannot queueing Easy system to understand you find where you want to go find the cost buy the ticket go wait for the train If you don't have enough coins to buy ticket you can exchange your paper money at every information office (ie at every station near ticket machine)

result.opinion: Trafficfree and easy to understand system

title: very fast
review: Very fast to bring us to our destinations The AC is cold so bring a sweater Sometimes it can be crowded inside during peak hours Clean reliable skytrain

result.opinion: Clean reliable skytrain

title: fast transport - no trafic hasle
review: the easy way to travel true Bangkok Any time the traffic is a big hassle here The BTS is a perfect way to move around They should have more lines and stations that would be best improvement for Bangkok trafic

result.opinion: The BTS is a perfect way to move around

title: its easy to use just ask
review: thise is first time i use the train but  it provided me a lot of money  i advice every body use the train because when you take  taxi by meter its traffic you will pay more than train

title: Easiest way to get around
review: Drop the taxis and greedy tuk tuks Take the sky train if possible It's  cheap and easy to do Once you try it once it's easy to just jump on and it runs to some of the great shopping malls and attractions  like SiamParagon mall and Chatuchak weekend market

result.opinion: Cheap and easy to do

title: A welcome break between Bangkok escapades!
review: Although the BTS can be extremely crowded the AC is topnotch BTS rides were always a welcome break from the 90+ degree Fahrenheit Bangkok weather The trains themselves were regular ontime and smooth If you get near a window you can catch some nice views of Bangkok  The travel information desks we went to were helpful and happy to exchange bills for coins The ticketing system is straightforward

result.opinion: Topnotch AC, welcome break from the heat, trains are regular, on-time and smooth, nice views from the window, helpful and happy staff at travel information desks.

title: Clean and easy to commute
review: Cheap and clean transportation for you to explore Bangkok Avoid rush hours though you wouldn't wanna get caught up in it

result.opinion: Clean transportation
Cheap and clean transportation

title: Say no to traffic
review: While using sky train you can avoid big traffic jam which is very heavy on Bangkok roads But sky train is not in every part of the city

result.opinion: Avoids big traffic jams
Avoids big traffic jams Safety is a concern

title: Above traffic jams
review: A good way to travel around Bangkok If you are traveling alone or with a friend it can be cheaper than a taxi The best idea is to get a Rabbit Card which will cost you 100thb giving you 60thb credit to travel where you wish and you can top it up as you need BTS interchanges with MRT BRT and even the river boats but the Rabbit Card only works with BTS

result.opinion: A good way to travel around Bangkok

title: Best way to commute
review: Very efficient and quick manner to commute in Bangkok Transportation is very comfortable and with AC Too bad its reach is kind of limited

result.opinion: Very efficient and quick manner to commute Transportation is very comfortable and with ACToo bad its reach is kind of limited

title: Best way to get around by far!!
review: So easy to use and cheap tooonly 150 bht for a day passbrilliant and saved my poor legs ha Trains run very regular and when I over ran a stop I just jumped off and back on to head the right way

result.opinion: So easy to use and cheap

title: Loved it
review: A great way to travel fast and efficient good views cover the city The locals were friendly and great with advice on where to go

result.opinion: A great way to travel fast and efficient good views cover the city

title: Change Coins
review: The "ticket" machines only accept coins in most station and you need to change coins at the counter which may have long queues during peak hours

title: Easy go
review: With Bangkok BTS Skytrain you can go easy and fast from one place to an other in Bangkok even to the Suwarnabumi Airport Trains are clean and nice and price is cheap and from up above you see parts of Bangkok you won't see in the traffic jam below

result.opinion: Easy and fast travel

title: Do this. Easy way to get around Bangkok.
review: Easy to get around using this system Fast and comfortable but crowded as to be expected Figure this out and you have a great experience

result.opinion: Easy to get around using this system

title: Tube made modern
review: Excellent service cheap and very modern Helps to have a aerial scenery of Bangkok Get out of the traffic and enjoy a ride on the "modern looking" Tube

result.opinion: Excellent service
Excellent service, cheap, and very modern.

title: A very simple system
review: This is a mode of transport that while in Bangkok you should really use it a day pass is recommended I think we paid under 500BHT for 3 tickets Very cheap and easy to use

result.opinion: Very cheap and easy to use

title: Good Access, Price and plenty of space
review: Being a Melbournian this train has all the things that we lack from Melbourne's train Plenty of handle bar that are easy to reach plenty of space for people to stand It's just great  What possibly they can improve is information for tourist which platform to which station more escalator as well as information how long we have to wait for the next train

result.opinion: Plenty of handle bar that are easy to reach plenty of space for people to stand It's just great What possibly they can improve is information for tourist which platform to which station more escalator as well as information how long we have to wait for the next train

title: Excellent
review: The best way around BKK Try to avoid the rush hour though   Wish they had a tourist card or unlimited card longer than one day   Btw BTS is the sky train and MRT is the underground

result.opinion: BTS is the sky train and MRT is the underground

title: A great system
review: A great transportation to beat the traffic in the city Easy to understand and very convenient They also mention the Tourist Attraction in certain area Highly recommended if you are arranging transportation by yourself

result.opinion: Easy to understand and very convenient

title: Used the Skytrain to travel around Bangkok
review: Used the Skytrain to travel around Bangkok Tip make sure you have change on hand for the machines to get your tickets it makes it easier Very clean and cheap transport

result.opinion: Very clean

title: Handy but gets busy!
review: We use the sky train a lot to get around It is air conditioned cheap and efficient At peak times trains run every couple of minutes and off peak about every 5

result.opinion: The sky train is convenient.

title: Everyone queue for the BTS even during peak hours
review: Everyone queue for the BTS even during peak hours Easy access to many locations for eating and shopping Walking distance to my hotel

result.opinion: Easy access to many locations for eating and shopping. Walking distance to my hotel.
Easy access to many locations for eating and shopping Walking distance to my hotel

title: One of the most efficient transportation systems I've used
review: Cut through all the notoriously congested Bangkok traffic with ease Super affordable quick efficient in my 15 years in BKK this has been my main form of transportation around the city   Wish we had a BTS system in more parts of the world

result.opinion: Super affordable quick efficient

title: Way faster without getting stuck with traffic
review: The fares are reasonable and the stations and trains are clean tooBest mode of transport if u want to avoid traffic at busy hoursStaff at information counters do a good job giving all the needful instructions to the passengers

result.opinion: Staff at information counters do a good job giving all the needful instructions to the passengers

title: easy access and cheap
review: This is a great form of transport and quick and cheap In Bangkok the biggest problem is traffic so using the BTS you fly over it

result.opinion: Great form of transport, quick and cheap

title: Efficient and easy to use
review: The BTS structures might look like an eyesore to many but for all people who new Bangkok prior the BTS this was the best & probably only option to move the Bangkok masses even acting as Sun Shade when walking along and it works on time at reasonable prices specially when using the Rabbit Cards & easy to use I do live in Sydney & wish we had something like that but impossible there for all sorts of reasons mainly political Am also thinking of cities like Manila Jakarta & others that could really benefit from a similar system

title: Not during rush hours
review: Early morning 4 congested trains can go pass in front of you no one able to get on the landform of any Absolutely the best otherwise transport in Bangkok to few only stops acrossEach Station attract high skyscrapers condominium at high premiums

title: pleasant experience
review: the queue to purchase the bts card was rather long probably due to peak period but overall instruction and labes are really clear and easy to understand train was clean and well maintained too

result.opinion: The train was clean and well maintained.
The instructions and labels were really clear and easy to understand.

title: Great affordable transport.
review: So very cheap to travel on the BTScleancomfortable and large windows for the city views The trains run in frequent intervals from the airport (international) to many parts of the cityit's usually our first form of transport upon arrival

title: Escape the madness
review: Unlike the "Deutsche Bundesbahn" the BTS is on time clean good value for money and easy to understand Travelling with the BTS I don't understand the flood of cars on Sukhumvit road spending hours for a few hundred meters For sure the best way to go from A to B

result.opinion: The BTS is on time
The BTS is clean.

title: Excellent and easy mode of transporation
review: Very clean and convenient  And there is certain to be a mall at almost every stop  The AC is a no treat too

result.opinion: Very clean
Very convenient

title: Best way to get around
review: I was in Bangkok for a few days only but used the BTS a lot It's the best way to get around quickly (with using the corresponding MRT as well of course)  The only disappointing thing could be that the line isn't extended to Don Muaeng ) Well neither is the BTS actually but you can use the Airport Railway Link from at least 2 BTS stations

result.opinion: The BTS is the best way to get around quickly.

title: Good way to explore BKK
review: Cheap comfortable and good way to transport in bkk You can explore thai people how live and learn somethings about their life  Don't forget the buy street fooda near to stations )

result.opinion: Cheap and good way to transport

title: The best transportation in town
review: Try to stay close to a main BTS station  It will be your best mode of transportation in this busy town  Very efficient & quick  You will avoid Taxi & Tuk Tuk drivers that prey of tourist  A 25 Bhat trip via BTs will cost you 200 Bhat by other methods especially in the rain

result.opinion: Very efficient & quick Avoid Taxi & Tuk Tuk drivers that prey of tourist A 25 Bhat trip via BTs will cost you 200 Bhat by other methods especially in the rain
Avoid Taxi & Tuk Tuk drivers that prey of tourist

title: Easy Access to Bangkok
review: we always use the Skytrain  itr got us through all of Bangkok easily and its easy to access and the staff are helpful

result.opinion: Helpful staff

title: Reliable transportation
review: Fast and convenient way to travel I am a big fan of sky train when I visit BKK the route covers many shopping destinations  Bought a day pass money well spent

result.opinion: Fast and convenient way to travel

title: Very convenient
review: Very convenient on time no hassle All places are accessible easily with BTS Signboards are well placed and the instruction are clear for foreigners like me It is advisable for you to have BTS train map for easier plan

result.opinion: Very convenient on time no hassle
Very convenient on time no hassle

title: Convenient w/Great ViEWS
review: i first came to Bangkok in 1985  Imagine no Skytrain  No Subway  It was all BUSES  All PRIVATE bus companies that didn't coordinate their routes with each other & that drove meandering routes not necessarily straight lines down major avenues  It was a mess and hot and punctuated wpuffs of black exhaust  Now you got the Skytrain  Take it to the very last stop and see Bangkok's skyline  I've seen Bangkok grow up  Now my "kids" are bigger and taller than me

title: Easy to use and fast but ..
review: Clean fast and easy to use but expensive compared to taxis and tut tutts Limited options as to where you can travel to also makes it limited in its use

result.opinion: Clean

title: From A to B
review: The skytrain is an excellent means of public transport in Bangkok as long as you avoid rush hour  it is frequent clean and airconditioned Connections between the two lines at Central are fast You avoid the traffic jams Bangkok is notorious for

result.opinion: The skytrain is clean and airconditioned.
Excellent means of public transport, frequent, clean, airconditioned, fast connections, avoids traffic jams

title: traffic
review: traffic in Bangkok is a nightmare to get around using the sky train is easy and economical Easy once you know how to

result.opinion: Easy and economical

title: Quick and Easy!
review: I take the BTS and walk most of the time when I'm in the city because the traffic is so bad It's very easy to make your way around the city as everything is in English There's always food and little shops at each station which is always interesting I recommend buying a BTS card and loading it up to save you the hassle of waiting in line to buy a ticket each time This will save you a lot of time during peak hours

result.opinion: Easy to make your way around the city as everything is in English BTS card and loading it up to save you the hassle of waiting in line to buy a ticket each time This will save you a lot of time during peak hours

title: Best way to get around Bangkok
review: Trains are clean and the fastest way to get around BangkokTickets are affordable especially for europeans

result.opinion: Trains are clean

title: Easy and Quick
review: The BTS Skytrain in Bangkok is the way to move around Bangkok It is easy quick and you can cool down as all trains are climate controlled When you select your hotel in the area of the Railway you can reach the exhibition centre in one way

result.opinion: Easy, quick, and climate-controlled
The BTS Skytrain in Bangkok is easy, quick, and convenient.

title: easy to get around
review: this is the best mode of transport around bangkok if you doing alot around the city get a 1 day day ticket 120 baht all day any stops its great

title: A good choice to get around bangkok

title: Easy and ckean
review: The skytrain is a good way of getting around as the traffic in Bangkok is so terrible Service is clean and efficient Ironically the cost for 4 people is more than a taxi though

title: Fastest way to get around the main areas in Bangkok
review: In traffic clogged Bangkok where traffic snarls can make a 10 minute journey stretch for as long as 3040 minutes or more the BTS sky train is a life saver Unfortunately it has restricted coverage but if there is a BTS station close to where you are and want to go don't even think about taking a taxi

result.opinion: BTS sky train is a life saver

title: Very organised and easy to navigate
review: Very organised and easy to navigate I used this all the time during my stay as it's the easiest way to get around as the traffic is crazy Great thing is that the air conditioning is very efficient and very welcomed on a hot humid day

title: Fast and easy to use
review: Sky train is fast easy to use and the cheapest way to get around  best way to avoid city traffic and by far the best way to get out to the Chatuchat weekend markets

result.opinion: Sky train is fast, easy to use and the cheapest way to get around
Sky train is fast, easy to use, and the cheapest way to get around.

title: Easy way to go around
review: I recommend BTS Skytrain for transportation in Bangkok Maps are clear and easy to read The trains are more frequent and are clean There are staff on the platforms I wish it was a smoother way to buy tickets If you have coins it's no problem So next time in Bangkok take a ride

result.opinion: The trains are clean
There are staff on the platforms

title: Easy way to explore Bangkok
review: Easy to use safe cheap & clean Good maps at each staton and progress within the carriage Even the back of the ticket has the stations on the line you are travelling

result.opinion: Easy to use safe cheap & clean Good maps at each staton and progress within the carriage Even the back of the ticket has the stations on the line you are travelling that corresponded to aspect: SafetyThe user feels safe on the train.
Easy to use, safe, cheap & clean. Good maps at each station and progress within the carriage. Even the back of the ticket has the stations on the line you are travelling.

title: Great way to travel around but not during busy hour!
review: Pros BTS Skytrain is a great way to travel Bangkok hotel (intercontinental holiday inn and more) shopping destination (chatucak market siam paragon platinum and more) and tourist spot (aquarium at siam paragon and more) It's cheap fast and clean  Cons However it's not recommend to travel during busy hour since there are so many people there while the station is pretty small You can purchase the ticket at automatic ticket machine but you need to have coin (you can't pay with paper money change at automatic ticket machine) You can pay with big change or with paper money only at ticket counter Beware most place only have 2 counters open so you need to prepare a Long queue during traffic hour  Using BTS Skytrain can be a problem for people using wheels chair or small kids with baby stroller since some of the station not providing any lifts and escalators They only give access by stairs at those station

result.opinion: BTS Skytrain is cheap, fast and clean. It's not recommend to travel during busy hour since there are so many people there.Using BTS Skytrain can be a problem for people using wheels chair or small kids with baby stroller since some of the station not providing any lifts and escalators.

title: Top class and reasonably priced
review: I always try and have change ready for the public transport ticket machines in bangkok  Food & drink is not allowed to be consumed whilst using the sky train  If monks don't have a place to sit it's good etiquette to offer them your seat  Sometimes security will ask to glance into your bag on your way into the station best to get it open ready if you see checks ahead so you can go through more quickly

title: very busy
review: very busy train and rude people anyone could have been hurt at anypoint no english speaking people either once we were there

result.opinion: Very busy train and rude people anyone could have been hurt at any point
No English speaking people

title: Reliable
review: Easy to use DIY tkt machine Just remember to bring small notes to purchase tks You need to exit station  walk to another station and buy another ticket if you need to transfer train

result.opinion: Easy to use, but inconvenient for transfers.
The review does not express an opinion about safety.

title: Super convenient and efficient
review: Bangkok's traffic can be very bad Also the rush hour here extends over many hours The BTS sky train is the solution Just stick to it for as many travels as possible and job will be able to predict travel times Even when some place is not directly reachable by the train we took a train to a place close by and then would walktaxituktuk Every time we took a taxi we would immediately regret And not because it was cheaper to take the train  for a family of 4 the train is sometimes more expensive than taxi For one or two people it's cheaper too

result.opinion: The BTS sky train is the solution to Bangkok's traffic.

title: wonderful system .....
review: Air conditioned trains every few minutes that cover most of the city  what more could  traveller want for such low fares

result.opinion: Air conditioned trains every few minutes that cover most of the city

title: Savior
review: BTS saves everyone who boards it from the traffic of bangkokespecially during the evening BTS is on timeclean and fast and you won't even realise there's chaos on the roads below your BTS tower A must for city like bangkok

title: Easy access to every part of the city!

title: Cold but easy to navigate
review: Can get quite crowded If you're going far take a cover up as the air con is freezing Otherwise it is very easy to navigate

title: BTS Skytrain is good choice to travel with public transportation
review: When you travel to a country or city using public transportation is an unique experience and an evidence you have been there BTS Skytrain ticket is cheap and this transportation will help you to go to the market or tourist area around Bangkok

title: Great Public transportation
review: Great service  Didn't have to wait long  Easy to use  Just wish they had elevators or escalators for those of us with bad knees  Very reliable and affordable service

result.opinion: Great service

title: Easy as!
review: Skytrain was so easy to use Loved it Air conditioned  and a little light panel above the doors makes it easy to see your stop Just a heads up if your carrying a back pack they do a security check But to me that's just peace of mind

title: Great idea
review: Its fast and a great idea but its just far to crowded for me The times i have been on you struggle to move Terrible with young childre

result.opinion: Too crowded and difficult to move around with young children.

title: Excellent BTS
review: During our 5 days trips most of the time we took BTS and taxi cheap and convenient Choose the hotel that is near to the BTS to save time and money

result.opinion: BTS and taxi were cheap and convenient.

title: So easy!
review: I'd you are traveling you must take the sky train For 1540 baht you can easily get around Maps are everywhere and easy to understand You find your destination and go up to the machines on the walls Select your fare depending on how many stops Put in change and there's your ticket Slide the ticket through and take it with you If you go too far or change your mind you can always pay the extra fee to the staff when you get off Always air conditioned

result.opinion: Easy to get around, maps are easy to understand

title: Convenient
review: Very easy to use Stops are in accessible locations Can be very busy at times but overall a good experience and much cheaper than getting a taxi or tuk tuk

result.opinion: Stops are in accessible locations
Very easy to use, Stops are in accessible locations

title: A boon to beat the traffic jam
review: Always make sure you stay near BTS for convenient hassle free access to major sights in bangkok It's clean and reliable and instead of taking a cab stuck in traffic the BTS gets you to most places But if you know you are commuting during off peak hours and you have young children and shopping taking a cab is excellent too

result.opinion: Always make sure you stay near BTS for convenient hassle free access to major sights in bangkok

title: Easy to use and faster than using taxi
review: Due to traffic in Bangkok it is far much better to use the Skytrain to get around  It's cheaper and faster than taxi However it's very crowded in Skytrain

result.opinion: Much better to use Skytrain due to traffic

title: Saves time but is not luxurious
review: The train itself is good but the BTS Skytrain experience is not Bangkok is extremely humid and the stations are all open air so humidity and hot weather are not a pleasant experience while waiting for trains but the train does save you from Sukhumvit traffic and saves time

result.opinion: Saves time and avoids Sukhumvit traffic.

title: Must ride
review: Tis is a must ride when in bangkok Swift and smooth communication away from mad traffic It connects swiftly to chao praya river and hemce can be convenient to cover whole of bangkok

result.opinion: Swift and smooth communication
Swift and smooth communication away from mad traffic It connects swiftly to chao praya river and hemce can be convenient to cover whole of bangkok

title: Best thing that has happened to Bangkok
review: The easiest cheapest and cleanest way to get around Bangkok I just wish that the entire city gets connected with this beautiful system The ticketing is easy access is super (you can get to the station from some malls without touching the street below) the service is punctual and efficient and the cleanliness is impeccable The trains are comfortable and clean The announcements are clear and co passengers are well behaved Note that the BTS can get very crowded during peak hours so avoid travelling at that time if you can Other than that this transit system scores big Well done BTS

result.opinion: The cleanliness is impeccable. The trains are comfortable and clean.

title: taxis cheaper and easier imo
review: the skytrain is a good way to get about but generally it doesnt get you directly from A to B Our hotel was on the river so required a boat to get to the skytrain station then the train to the weekend markets We got a taxi back which was cheaper and far easier

result.opinion: The skytrain is not always the most direct route.

title: Easy way to get aroubd
review: We didn't use the BTS much on our trip but every experience was great Very easy to buy tickets figure out where you're going and make your way around the stations   Probably better for solo travellers as cabs and Uber are very cheap in Bangkok

result.opinion: Very easy to buy tickets, figure out where you're going and make your way around the stations

title: Fast efficient  clean and easy to use
review: A brilliant  way to get around Bangkok is the skytrain   It is fast efficient  and easy to navigate   It's  inexpensive  using the rabbit passwhich can be topped upas needed

result.opinion: It is fast, efficient, and easy to navigate.
A brilliant way to get around Bangkok is the skytrain  It is fast efficient  and easy to navigate  It's  inexpensive  using the rabbit pass which can be topped up as needed

title: Easy to get around
review: We took the train from MBK to Mo Chit station Very easy to figure out  Only 168 baht for 4 of us The signs are easy to understand

result.opinion: Very easy to figure out

title: Superb time exploring bangkok on BTS
review: I travelled with two older teenagers from the UK so I don't speak Thai however didn't have any problems with the language Most people spoke English  We travelled to Mo Chit to the huge weekend market and several trips to patpong Siam and central pier Very cheap and avoids the huge traffic jams in bangkok

result.opinion: No problems with the language, most people spoke English.

title: Efficient but expensive
review: It is a very efficient system of commuting but if you are 2 people it can prove the same as a can or at times a little More expensive peak hours Friday and Saturday it is bursting at the seams at least around the shopping areas

title: Easy to use
review: The sky train was conveniently located right next door to our hotel Novatel Ploenchet It was easy to use cheap and higher tech than I thought it would be It's good

result.opinion: Conveniently located right next door

title: Great way to get around
review: We often used the BTS to get around Bangkok and the joy is that's it's air conditioned Found it a bit annoying to have to pay for our 3 year old but we come from London where children travel for free Found it a little expensive sometimes cheaper to get a taxi depending where you go But BTS is probably quicker than driving a lot of the time as traffic is so horrendous Very easy to navigate and security check bags upon entry Busy at peak times as expected Used it to get to the airport

result.opinion: Found it a bit annoying to have to pay for our 3 year old but we come from London where children travel for free

title: Great!
review: Great experience and easy to use  It takes a few times to get used to how much to pay according to how far you are going  Otherwise great but it can get a little crowded

result.opinion: Easy to use
Great experience and easy to use

title: Great way to get around!
review: Awesome Method of transport Busy during commuter times as expected Clean and fast Just remember to save your coins to use here

result.opinion: Clean and fast
Clean and fast

title: Clean and not too crowded
review: Having lived in Bangkok some years ago I looked forward to catching the sky train after taking the train from the airport The BTS value storage card is called Rabbit and for Baht 180 you get card plus Baht 100 stored value  Baht 80 is not refundable Sky train was still clean and even the whistle men still try and control passengers who still tend ro board before letting passengers off If you staying in Sky train area it is well worth the cost but be warned it does get crowded at peak time

result.opinion: Sky train was still clean

title: Riding the Railway
review: Experienced every time I visit the city Efficient Cheap Punctual and Extensive It is a pleasure to utilize this mode of transport From getting  off the plane in and around the city this is the pillar of the city

result.opinion: It is a pleasure to utilize this mode of transport
Punctual and Extensive

title: The only way to go!
review: Bangkok is a great city but getting in and out of a cab without the hassle of where when how why and how much is impossible A lot of great hotels are near BTS Skytrain stations The sky trains are clean easy to buy tickets for and take you to most tourist destinations in Bangkok My family of 5 (Mum Dad and three teenage daughters) use the BTS each time we visit Bangkok The average 45 stop journey costs about 3540 baht

title: Easy to use
review: Easy to use  We travelled to MBK fromNana station Be advised that National Stadium ticket machines only take coin no notes however there was a cashier available Be travelled during daylight hours so not sure if cashier is available all hours

result.opinion: Easy to use

title: Cheap Transportation
review: Not difficult to learn the Skytrain system It is fast on time and a good way to get around All signs are in english

result.opinion: Not difficult to learn, fast on time, and a good way to get around

title: City's lifeline
review: Very convenient connecting all the major places If you dont have change  dont bother  there would be a change counter just near the ticket machine

result.opinion: Very convenient connecting all the major places

title: Great method to travel - no hassles of taxi
review: We were staying near Victory Monument and the BTS is close it works from 6 am till midnight Very safe and always busy and on peak time there is  no sitting place and it goes even to the international airport and connected to all huge malls like MBK and siam paragon

result.opinion: Very safe

title: An Excellent sky train service to Enjoy
review: Bangkok tour was simply rewarding due to its beautiful sky train service A bit expensive but one will like to take it because it saves your time in Bangkok You are connected with all places of attractions by BTS Sky train

result.opinion: Bangkok tour was simply rewarding due to its beautiful sky train service

title: A great way to get around Bangkok
review: We stayed near the Asoke station and used the BTS as our main mode of transport  It was great we usually rely on taxis when in Bangkok the BTS was easy to use and reasonably priced much cheaper than using taxis not to mention a good experience

result.opinion: BTS was easy to use and reasonably priced

title: Use it don't be hesitant
review: Very easy to use clean and fast when all streets are jam packed and stopped Excellent air conditioning

result.opinion: Excellent air conditioning
Excellent air conditioning

title: Practical, clean, cheap and safe
review: Hi all I recommend using the BTS Skytrain as much as you can It's a great way to see the city I'm scared of heights but it' is high but not that high ) At the moment if you buy a RABBIT CARD it'll give you a reduced price More importantly  you'll have quicker access at the station you won't have to queue at the ticket machines I bought mine at a BTS station Just ask the person working at the booth For a week I used about 300 Bath (I never took taxis) You can top up the card the same way If you return the card they give you a 50 Bath deposit back Happy travels    * BTW when you get a RABBIT CARD you have to choose if you want it for the Skytrain (the train a little up in the air) or MRT (underground route)

result.opinion: Recommends using the BTS Skytrain for convenience.

title: Great Transit
review: This is the fastest and easiest way to go around in Bangkok Ticket price starting from 2050 Baht Please avoid peak time from 79 AM and 58PM at weekday

result.opinion: Fastest and easiest way to go around

title: Excellent Connectivity
review: If you figure your way around the BTS skytrain getting around bangkok can be very convenient and save a lot of time

result.opinion: Very convenient and save a lot of time

title: Best way to travel around bangkok
review: BTS skytrain is the quickest way to get around Bangkok as Bangkok's traffic is the worst And also the BST connects to major mall for shopping  I would recommend shoppers to try the BST rather than the taxi

result.opinion: BTS skytrain is the quickest way to get around Bangkok
BTS skytrain is the quickest way to get around Bangkok

title: So easy!
review: It is pretty intimidating to start with but once you get the hang of it its your best option especially with Bangkok traffic So reliable comes through every 5 minutes and there is always someone to ask if you are not sure

result.opinion: Reliable, comes every 5 minutes, someone to ask if unsure

title: Quick and Easy to understand.
review: its quick cheap and easy to understand i would recommend planing your tours and trips around these as they take you to within walking distance of lots of attractions that you may want to see whilst in BKK

result.opinion: Quick, cheap, and easy to understand.
Easy to understand

title: Great Transit
review: Sky Metro and Water the Transit system in Bangkok has it all Very easy to use and reliable and fast

result.opinion: Very easy to use and reliable and fast

title: Skytrain
review: Gotta love the easy transportation here This is a quick and effortless way to get wherever you need to go And the air conditioning felt wonderful after time spent in the heat

result.opinion: Love the easy transportation

title: BTS - most convenient way to travel
review: The BTS is really easy to use and covers most of the popular areas of the city I combine the BTS with the river boats which covers other places not accessible by BTS I bought a pass I think the deposit is 100 BHT and the card cost another 100 BHT Most trips are 25 to 30 BHT Be careful not to bend the card I had the card in my back pocket so it was slightly bent When I tried to return it for my deposit they refused to accept the card The card was still usable as I had been using it all the while although slight bent I also like the BTS as it doesn't have to contend with traffic jams Peak hours can be very crowded though but I always managed to squeeze in

result.opinion: The BTS is really easy to use and covers most of the popular areas of the city.
The BTS is safe as I always managed to squeeze in.

title: BTS
review: Very clean effecient and a big cost saving compared to tuk tuk and taxi in bangkok The stations are conveniently situated at most of the tourist attractions and leave you short walking distanced to main attractions

result.opinion: Very clean

title: Good local experience
review: Enjoyed getting on the trains although it is almost  always very crowded To change trains on different lines is very easy For a group like ours (6 people) travelling by train is not very cheap (fares average S$130) From the station you still might have to walk a distance to get to some shopping centres unlike Singapore where the train station is right below the shopping malls Given the hot weather it will help to bring an  umbrella and wear a hat AFter 3 days we decided to take 2 taxis to go back to the hotel

result.opinion: Enjoyed getting on the trains although it is almost always very crowded

title: All aboard the Skytrain
review: Great Air condition way to travel around Bangkok The trains and platforms were vere clean and the service was very easy to use

result.opinion: Great Air condition way to travel around Bangkok The trains and platforms were very clean and the service was very easy to use The trains and platforms were very clean
Great Air condition way to travel around Bangkok The trains and platforms were vere clean and the service was very easy to use

title: Easy access, fast and efficient train services
review: Fast efficient and cost effective way of getting through inner Bangkok Stops at all the key central sites and business sectors

result.opinion: Fast efficient and cost effective

title: Travel around the city by the BTS
review: Its easy economical and the best to avoid traffic You can see most of the attractions using the BTS We also used the Airport rail for travelling to & from the airport

result.opinion: Easy, economical, and best to avoid traffic

title: Comfy & fast
review: Well connected & comfortable travel option within the city Helps you avoid trafficbig time  Any day recommended

result.opinion: Well connected & comfortable travel option within the city

title: Fast and efficient
review: This is a fast and efficient way to move around in Bangkok It is such a relief to get out of the heat and madness of the traffic jams and travel in cool comfort The trains can be jam packed during the peak hours though travel times should be planned well

result.opinion: Fast and efficient way to move around

title: Comfortable and "cool
review: In a nutshell BTS will take you to most bangkok attractions and neighborhoods and if it doesn't you can still use the subway Trains are modern and have AC which is why my title said "cool" and after a very hot day walking around bangkok riding the BTS is a blessing even if it is for 15 minutes Fares depend on distance and it 's most avisable to carry lots of coins (but you can get change and advice at the infochange booths at every station) At rush hour trains are packed but they run pretty often you can always wait for the next trainand you can buy all kinds of stuff from the little stores at avery station from protein bars to shoes ans socks

title: Very clean easy to use
review: The quickest and easiest way to get around Bangkok Very clean air conditioned carriages and SAFE There is security on the platforms at each station Can get crowded during the rush hours but nothing compared to the Tube in London

result.opinion: SAFE and security on the platforms
Very convenient

title: Save time train
review: not cheap but cuts through the traffic is very good from the airport as you won't get stuck in traffic jams for 2 hours like we did when we arrived

result.opinion: Cuts through the traffic is very good from the airport as you won't get stuck in traffic jams for 2 hours

title: Take a cab on off peak hours
review: Easy to get around as long as you don't need to go very far but considering the endemic traffic in Bangkok it is worth a try  Expensive by bangkok's standard but well organised ( apart from the long queues when one has to buy a ticket )

result.opinion: Easy to get around as long as you don't need to go very far

title: Great way to get about
review: The service is quick and easy Trains run constantly Best and cheapest way to get around Easy way to get to airport

result.opinion: Service is quick and easy. Trains run constantly.Best and cheapest way to get around.Easy way to get to airport.

title: Wet during Songkran
review: Went during Songkran train itself was wet due to the soaking travellers It was super fun Technically water guns are not allowed on the train

title: BTS Subway Exp.
review: Easy ticket purchase fast reliable air conditioned trains Stops clearly marked and staff in booths very helpful

result.opinion: Staff in booths very helpful

title: fun travellin in BTS
review: Its very economical & faster especially in the evenings when the main roads are one way fr traffic The tickets need to be bought from the vending machine & change is freely available Near the stations are small shops good for tit bit shopping

title: Works perfectly
review: This is by far the easiest way of transportation to get around central Bangkok It's easy clean and cheap And it runs all the time you don't have to wait around for long

result.opinion: Easy, clean, and cheap. Runs all the time and no long waits.

title: superb
review: excellent way to commute they also gov eu change int he counter so u can purchase your ticket from the machines

title: Cool
review: A great nice and clean trnsportation systemcompare to other city in the world we was really impress

result.opinion: Impressed by the cleanliness

title: A boon for the city with horrible traffic
review: the first thing you observe once you reach Bangkok roads is that the traffic everywhere is horrible at office times especially on Friday the roads are choked to an extend that a 25 km travel may take a good 15 hours to 2 hours of time Considering this the BTS skytrain is a boon to the city which keeps you out of traffic and helps you reach your destination in time at rush hours the trains are crowded so bringing in big luggage will not be a good idea The stations are good and mostly easy accessible

result.opinion: The BTS skytrain is a boon to the city and helps you reach your destination in time.

title: Convenient and not convenient
review: I have tried the BTS from the airport to Thonglor it was convenient and not convenient as well The vending machine does not accept note and only coins even for kids need pay full price For most countries the senior and kids pay half The vending machine has no multitickets function you need to buy ticket one by one If you have more than three people to go you take a taxi will be cheaper It is fast than taxi as no traffic jam Another thing not convenient is the BTS are three stories level above the gound floor we have to walk down and no escalators or lifts for going down I carried very heavy luggage and not convenient at all

result.opinion: The vending machine does not accept notes and only coins even for kids need pay full price. The vending machine has no multitickets function you need to buy ticket one by one.  The BTS are three stories level above the ground floor we have to walk down and no escalators or lifts for going down.
Not convenient, vending machine only accepts coins, no multitickets function, three stories above ground floor with no escalators or lifts

title: BTS
review: You can go anywhere (almost) by BTS  You may want to consider getting a 199 bht travel card  Not sure what the deal is but there are posters all around the station  Coins are required for most automated ticketing machines so you may want to keep some coins handy  Otherwise you can always get change from station control  Beats waiting in the Bangkok jam in a taxi

result.opinion: Not sure what the deal is but there are posters all around the station
You can go anywhere (almost) by BTS

title: Best transport..
review: Sky train is best local transport of Bangkok if you study carefully bts map you can save lot of money during your tripit's easly avaliable on Internet Bts cover almost stations Neat and clean  station helpful staff and worth full services

result.opinion: Helpful staff and worth full services

title: Good Metro
review: Confy good AC Best when there is lots of trafic We usually used this instead of taxi or tuk tuk

result.opinion: Confy good AC Best when there is lots of trafic We usually used this instead of taxi or tuk tuk

title: Convenient travel around
review: You can have a good city overview and easy way to avoid city traffic  We were 4 ppl together sometimes its not cost effective for us as taxi cost same for some destination but way faster than taxi  Easy to use if you know your destination nearer BTS station

result.opinion: Easy to use if you know your destination nearer BTS station

title: Really simple and easy to use!
review: This system is very cheap and easy to use   Stations are well signposted and well staffed (not all speak English) It's so cheap that we just tended to buy single tickets   Trains are well maintained clean and more importantly  air conditioned

result.opinion: Stations are well staffed (not all speak English)
Cheap and easy to use Well signposted and well staffed So cheap that we just tended to buy single tickets Air conditioned

title: Fast, cheap and crowded
review: The Skytrain is the only way to beat the heavy and constant traffic jams in Bangkok and it is a must for getting across town It's cheap efficient and clean but it is mostly very crowded Look out for pickpockets

result.opinion: Look out for pickpockets

title: Fast and efficient.
review: Train runs on a regular basis and is very cheap Tends to be very busy but will take you to the outskirts of the city to enjoy the open markets An excellent service

result.opinion: Excellent service that corresponded to aspect: Convenience

title: standard service
review: ineffective tickets because we have to buy the tix buy coins clean train friendly officers good access

title: The Best Way to commute..
review: The best and easy way to commute to all tourist places in Bangkok Shopping places of attraction street food airport Famous malls etc

result.opinion: The review does not express an opinion about convenience.
The best and easy way to commute

title: Nice to travel around BANGKOK,but too cold.
review: Sky train is a heaven for everyone who hate bad traffic in Bangkok There are difference types of card for you to use One day card or one way ticket (depends on where you going) and rabbit card I recommend for everyone who will be in Bangkok over 1 week and use BTS to travel around alot

result.opinion: Sky train is a heaven for everyone who hate bad traffic in Bangkok

title: Great way to get around for tourist pursuits!
review: We discovered the BTS sky train when we were trying to go to the Chatuchak weekend market on the Saturday we arrived in Bangkok I happened to be staying right off sukumvit road at the Amari boulevard hotel and was able to walk just about 3 blocks to find the entrance to the train  The far is very cheap and the stations are clean I do not believe that all of the stations are accommodating to those with disabilities as there are a ton of stairs to deal with  The train line we rode went straight out to mo chit where the market is and on the way back we noticed that stops were made at major shopping malls eateries and movie theaters   Air conditioning and clear announcements really make this train a great way to get around  The only down side is that the system is not sprawling and operates in a very narrow section of the city I live in NYC so I am used to a comprehensive train system but this was good for what we needed  Additionally metered taxis are so cheap so if you need to go somewhere not located off the sky train just hail a cab and make sure they use the meter don't negotiate a flat rate I promise the meter will be cheaper For example a 28kilometer ride to the airport on the meter was only 230 baht  Have fun

title: Easy and affordable
review: Best way to travel around Bangkok Cheap easy and very convenient I always take the BTS when I am in the area

result.opinion: Very convenient
